meanings.definition: The quality or state of being overly theatrical or melodramatic.
meanings.sent1: Her hamminess in the school play made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The actor's hamminess on stage was entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent3: His hamminess during the talent show was so exaggerated, it was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The hamminess of the magician's performance was like a colorful explosion on stage.
meanings.sent5: The hamminess of her acting was so over-the-top, it stayed in everyone's memory.

meanings.definition: Exaggerated or over-the-top behavior or performance.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's hamminess had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent2: His hamminess in the comedy sketch was a hit with the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The hamminess of the clown's act was so exaggerated, it had everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent4: The hamminess of the singer's performance was like a burst of confetti on stage.
meanings.sent5: The hamminess of the actor's portrayal made the whole scene come alive.
